name: Maze Quest 1: The Forest
description:
Maze Quest 1: The Forest is a simple relaxing puzzle game. Play as Sylvie the Elf and find your way home through 100 forest-themed maze levels.
Features:
  • 100 mazes with increasing size and difficulty
  • Relaxing puzzle game, no enemies or fighting
  • Use keyboard or mouse to navigate through the levels
  • Steam Achievements
